ygData.subject: Old Erudian
ygData.msgSnippet: Fellow Karanans: Is there anyone out there that calls Karana their home that speak Old Erudian?  I have put about 20-30 points into it now and find I am all
ygData.messageBody:
Fellow Karanans:

Is there anyone out there that calls Karana their home that speak Old
Erudian? I have put about 20-30 points into it now and find I am all alone
is this work for people to talk to in it. If someone about my skill would
like to start trading off points to help build the skill please let me know.
We are going to need this skill soon peolpe (me in 2 lvls) so lets all help
each other out. Once I get to a point where I can read the books I will
start teaching others the language.

Shadair
14th Dark Elf Wizzard
Karana
